> 
> 
> 46 minutes ago, BT Industries said:
> 
> 
> Yes me and my friend are taking over this mod. We are not very experienced modders but this mod was to good to be left to die.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I hope so too
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I'm not planning on adding any new parts any time soon as Im not a expert with modeling.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I'm planning to start releasing this on a boat by boat update starting with the pleasure craft.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Still waiting for the files to arrive but it's not long now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
> 

If you need  some help let me know. Also the are endless resources in the modding threads that help if your in a bind.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-01T00:41:54Z" title="03/01/2016 12:41  AM" data-short="8 yr">March 1, 2016</time> by BT Industries**

I think it'd be better for all involved if we closed this thread and directed discussion to the thread [@BT Industries](%7B___base_url___%7D/index.php?/profile/156823-bt-industries/) started. If [@Fengist](%7B___base_url___%7D/index.php?/profile/78435-fengist/) returns and wishes to resume development we can reopen this one.

Edit: Fengist has returned but has chosen to start a new thread instead, see here:
